ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound Italian sausage, casings removed
2 (14 ounce) jars pickled red peppers (such as Peppadew®), drained

cookingTips: Remove sausage casings completely and brown the meat until cooked through before stuffing
Pat peppers dry before filling to help sausage adhere better
Bake at 375°F for 15-20 minutes until peppers are heated through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Advise on how to evenly stuff small peppers without tearing them and the best method for browning sausage.
